ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: Hi, I am a German-speaking Frontend Developer based near Hamburg. Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT, I am excited about crafting visually captivating and intuitive websites and applications.
ABOUT.LOCATION: Flexible in terms of working environments, I can work effectively around Winsen to Lüneburg or Hamburg and remotely.
ABOUT.BULB: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
ABOUT.PUZZLE: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code; it's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.

SKILLS-SECTION.HEADLINE: My Skills
SKILLS-SECTION.TITLE: I have gained experience in creating projects using various frontend technologies and concepts.
SKILLS-SECTION.UNDER-TEXT-HEADLINE: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

PORTFOLIO-SECTION.PORTFOLIO-UNDER-HEADLINE: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
PORTFOLIO-SECTION.JOIN-UNDER-HEADLINE: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
PORTFOLIO-SECTION.LOCO-UNDER-HEADLINE: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and bottles to fight against the boss chicken.
PORTFOLIO-SECTION.POKEDEX-UNDER-HEADLINE: Based on the PokéAPI, a simple library that provides and catalogues Pokémon information.

REFERENCES-SECTION.TEAM-PARTNER: Emrah consistently demonstrates exceptional reliability and a proactive, solution-oriented mindset in all collaborations. With sharp analytical skills and remarkable initiative, Emrah excels at resolving complex challenges, providing invaluable support to the team during pivotal moments. Notably, Emrah's ability to swiftly grasp new concepts and systematically drive progress toward project goals stands out as a key strength.

CONTACT-SECTION.CONTACT-DESCRIPTION: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
CONTACT-SECTION.CONTACT-ME: Need a Frontend developer? Contact me!

LEGACY-SECTION.HEADLINE: Legal Notice

Legal obligations to remove information or to block the use of information remain unaffected. In this case, liability is only possible from the moment of knowledge of a specific infringement. PRIVACY-SECTION.DETAIL-FIRST: 1. Information on the Collection of Personal Data
PRIVACY-SECTION.PARAGRAPH1: (a) In the following, we inform you about the collection of personal data when using our website. Personal data are all data that can be personally related to you, e.g. name, address, email addresses, user behaviour.
PRIVACY-SECTION.PARAGRAPH2: (b) Controller pursuant to Art. 4 para. 7 of the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is Ismail Emrah Okur, An'n Haidweg 1, 21423 Winsen Luhe, Deutschland.
PRIVACY-SECTION.PARAGRAPH3: You have the following rights with respect to the personal data concerning you:
PRIVACY-SECTION.PARAGRAPH4: You also have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority concerning the processing of your personal data.
PRIVACY-SECTION.HEADLINE3: 3. Collection of Personal Data When Visiting Our Website
PRIVACY-SECTION.PARAGRAPH5: If you wish to view our website, we collect the following data, which are technically necessary for us to display our website to you and to ensure stability and security (legal basis is Art. 6 para. 1 sentence 1 lit. f GDPR):
PRIVACY-SECTION.LIST7: Date and time of the request
PRIVACY-SECTION.LIST8: Time zone difference to Greenwich Mean Time (GMT)
PRIVACY-SECTION.LIST11: Data volume transmitted in each case
PRIVACY-SECTION.LIST12: Website from which the request comes
PRIVACY-SECTION.LIST14: Language and version of the browser software
PRIVACY-SECTION.PARAGRAPH6: When you contact us by email or via a contact form, the data you provide (your email address, possibly your name and telephone number) will be stored by us in order to answer your questions. We delete the data arising in this context after storage is no longer necessary, or limit the processing if there are statutory retention obligations.
PRIVACY-SECTION.PARAGRAPH7: We host the contents of our website with the following provider:
PRIVACY-SECTION.PARAGRAPH8: The provider is ALL-INKL.COM - Neue Medien Münnich, Owner René Münnich, Hauptstraße 68, 02742 Friedersdorf (hereinafter All-Inkl). For details, please see All-Inkl's privacy policy:
PRIVACY-SECTION.PARAGRAPH9: The use of All-Inkl is based on Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR. We have a legitimate interest in having our website displayed as reliably as possible. If corresponding consent has been requested, the processing is carried out exclusively on the basis of Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR and § 25(1) TDDDG, insofar as the consent includes the storage of cookies or access to information in the user's end device (e.g., device fingerprinting) within the meaning of the TDDDG. The consent can be revoked at any time.
PRIVACY-SECTION.PARAGRAPH10: We have concluded an order processing agreement for the use of the above-mentioned service. This is a contract required by data protection law, which ensures that they process the personal data of our website visitors only according to our instructions and in compliance with the GDPR.
